summary: Defines a configurable convolutional feed‑forward module based on the Vision Attention Network (VAN) design, handling layer construction, weight initialization, and forward computation for image‑centric models within the xformers framework.
business_intent: Offer a reusable, plug‑in feed‑forward component that leverages 2D convolutions to efficiently process visual data in transformer‑style architectures, enabling developers to integrate VAN‑style blocks into their vision models.
